description: A probe by the European Commission into possible manipulation of oil prices has just gotten bigger. Finland's only refiner has also been asked to help with the investigation. And, with an aging population in the U.S., a look at the cost of an older person taking a fall.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, May 17, 2013
teaser: A probe by the European Commission into possible manipulation of oil prices has just gotten bigger. Finland's only refiner has also been asked to help with the investigation. And, with an aging population in the U.S., a look at the cost of an older person taking a fall.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, May 17, 2013
byline: Audrey Quinn, Stan Alcorn, David Gura, Sam Beard, Gigi Douban, Karen Clark, Richard Westcott and David Brancaccio
